title: Trevor Chats with His Grandma and Tours Her Home "MTV Cribs"-Style | Self-Deportation Edition
itunes:title: Trevor Chats with His Grandma and Tours Her Home "MTV Cribs"-Style | Self-Deportation Edition
description:
Trevor travels to Johannesburg, South Africa, where he reminisces with his beloved grandmother and talks to Usher about the 2018 Global Citizen Festival.
